title: 6.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
The table below shows the number of medals won by different students in the National Sports Meet from 2018 to 2022.

Using Excel, fill the Total Medalscolumn for each student and find out who won the most number of medals in fi ve years. Plot a line graph also for this data.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
